_sText:
En 

Scenario : A group of terrorists has taken control of a weapons storage of FFMT's Air Force. They had only knives, but they were able to do it ^^'... Some Counter Terrorists have been sent to neutralize them... But they have been woken up when they were sleeping, so they forget their weapons :o ! (Sorry, the scenario is not really believable, but I did'n find anything better ^^)

Objective and description of the map : In this map, you have to kill the enemy team...
You begin with a knife, but it's a weapons storage, so you will be able to find weapons in multiple places of the map... But to pick up these maps, you will have to open a door by pressing a button which is in the control room (at the first floor), or you will have to take the weapons in a room... But this one is protected by lasers ^^'. Of course you can choose to fight with your knife directly ^^ !

(Sorry, my english is not perfect... ^^)
